data.name: NumberedSortingInfo
desc: contains information for sorting a ContentResultSet.
In contrast to the struct SortingInfo this struct is used to be on the safe side, that no one asks for sorting by a property which is not contained in a ContentResultSet.

items.name: Ascending
lines: contains a flag indicating the sort mode (ascending or descending).

items.name: ColumnIndex
lines: sort the result set by this column.
